entry.title: BetterHash status
entry.summary: The status of Matt Corallo's "BetterHash" BIP was enquired by Anthony Casciano through bitcoin-dev mailing list. The message suggested that the implementation should go into production sooner than later and asked for a second opinion. However, things go into production only when people decide to adopt them. Those interested can contribute to the implementation at https://github.com/TheBlueMatt/mining-proxy.
